task.summary: Default task
Refactor `dmm_wp_title` to more correctly use filter while maintaining backward-compatibility
Adjusted #content left margin; Removed `table` element properties; Added conditional check for custom post types
Minor clarification update
Minor padding on menu anchor text
Add 'extra.css' file to be used for menu animations
Added 'wip' folder for works-in-progress and demonstration code
Added `dmm_scripts_and_styles` to enqueue additional scripts and styles
IDE update
Theme version check conditional corrections
Added note about "wip" folder contents
Updated `custom-background` parameters to use default image and color
Miscellaneous updates and version bump tagged 2.0.3-RC1
Release version 2.0.3
Update 'readme' with version 2.0.3 trac ticket reference
Removed backward compatibility check for wp_nav_menu
Reduce z-index of #cup to put under menu
Changed enqueued version to be dynamically taken from theme version; Change 'comment-reply' script hook to 'comment_form_before'

* Added DMM_HOME_DOMAIN constant for better future proofing * Added 'DMM No Posts Found' function to replace repetitive code * Removed backward compatibility checks to bring in line with current WordPress versions (3.4+) * Removed DMM_Add_Body_Classes in favor of using BNS Body Classes at http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/bns-body-classes/
Tagged as version 2.1; ready for release
* Updated 'style.css' header block to use labels as noted in core trac ticket #16868
* Add `clear: both` to 'img.aligncenter, img.center' to fix Firefox issue with large images placed close to the featured image
* Update version compatibility in main theme block as well as update copyright years
* Added filtered text messages when comments are open/closed but none exist
* Added link to author page when comments closed message is displayed
* Remove var_dump test
* Adjusted `li.text_widget` margin values
* Expanded use of DMM_HOME_DOMAIN constant
* Added ordered list styles for pages with comments
* Added `max-width` property to '.wp-caption img'
* Adjusted various CSS elements and properties to display TUT data more correctly
* Code cleanup
* Refactored author "About" box to not show empty details * Added classes to author "About" box details for easier display manipulation
* Centered searchform box and hid screen reader text
* Adjusted `hr` class properties
* Corrected closed comments logic to properly display message
* Added site title and description id to appropriate HTML container
* Added WordPress ticket reference http://themes.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/13428
* Fix comments closed message displaying when comments are open
* Version update
* Version update; update 'readme.txt' to reference http://themes.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/13479
* Added Serbo-Croatian translation by Andrijana Nikolic from webhostinggeeks.com
* Added support for post format 'link'
* Added support for Post-Format: Link * Added appropriate styling for post-format: link related items
* Commented out the "Page Permalink" as an unpopular feature * Updated version number to 2.2.3
* Removed really old browser CSS support ... going with support for current only
* Added DMM_SHOW_PAGE_PERMALINK constant * Made "Page Permalink" link conditionally display with default as false.
* Removed unused $sep_location parameter
* Update `readme.txt` with version 2.2.3 trac ticket #15296 * Update version to 2.2.4-alpha in preparation for future updates * Updated Changelog to add 2.2.4 headings
* Code reformatted to better meet the WordPress Coding Standards
* Minor clean-up of old properties * Code reformatted to better meet the WordPress Coding Standards * Clean-up `readme.txt` file * Updated Copyright Years
* Removed call to `function_exists( 'dynamic_sidebar' )` as required WordPress version precludes its necessity
* Added `Textdomain` to theme header block
* Added `dmm_post_meta_link_edit()` function with filter hooks for DRY purposes
* Fixed typo on `.wp-caption img` max-width property
* Fixed `.wp-caption` left and right alignment issues
* Replaced screenshot with new 880 x 660 version (removed secondary screenshots)
* Changed `fixed-width` theme tag to `fixed-layout` * Added trac reference https://themes.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/17976 to `readme.txt` * Set version as 2.2.4.1
* Code reformatting to better meet current WordPress Coding Standards
* Removed `wp_list_bookmarks` section from `sidebar.php` template
* Dropped backward compatibility for `wp_title` with Desk Mess Mirrored Child-Themes based on version 2.1 and earlier
* Aligned previous month text in default calendar widget to left - minor documentation updates
* Stop Gravity Forms reCaptcha iframe from creating a blank area in the footer
* Take into account what happens on the 404 page when returning no posts
* Fixed mixed list bullets
* Added BNS Login "Compatibility Code" to use dashicons instead of text
* Minor layout adjustments for widget items
* Adjusted screenshot size to be 880x660 pixels

MESSAGE.value: * Added support for Post-Format: Link * Added appropriate styling for post-format: link related items
* Commented out the "Page Permalink" as an unpopular feature * Updated version number to 2.2.3
* Removed really old browser CSS support ... going with support for current only
* Added DMM_SHOW_PAGE_PERMALINK constant * Made "Page Permalink" link conditionally display with default as false.
* Removed unused $sep_location parameter
* Update `readme.txt` with version 2.2.3 trac ticket #15296 * Update version to 2.2.4-alpha in preparation for future updates * Updated Changelog to add 2.2.4 headings
* Code reformatted to better meet the WordPress Coding Standards
* Minor clean-up of old properties * Code reformatted to better meet the WordPress Coding Standards * Clean-up `readme.txt` file * Updated Copyright Years
* Removed call to `function_exists( 'dynamic_sidebar' )` as required WordPress version precludes its necessity
* Added `Textdomain` to theme header block
* Added `dmm_post_meta_link_edit()` function with filter hooks for DRY purposes
* Fixed typo on `.wp-caption img` max-width property
* Fixed `.wp-caption` left and right alignment issues
* Replaced screenshot with new 880 x 660 version (removed secondary screenshots)
* Changed `fixed-width` theme tag to `fixed-layout` * Added trac reference https://themes.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/17976 to `readme.txt` * Set version as 2.2.4.1
* Code reformatting to better meet current WordPress Coding Standards
* Removed `wp_list_bookmarks` section from `sidebar.php` template
* Dropped backward compatibility for `wp_title` with Desk Mess Mirrored Child-Themes based on version 2.1 and earlier
* Aligned previous month text in default calendar widget to left - minor documentation updates
* Stop Gravity Forms reCaptcha iframe from creating a blank area in the footer
* Take into account what happens on the 404 page when returning no posts
* Fixed mixed list bullets
* Added BNS Login "Compatibility Code" to use dashicons instead of text
* Minor layout adjustments for widget items
* Adjusted screenshot size to be 880x660 pixels

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: * Adjusted screenshot size to be 880x660 pixels
